argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | nffn.1 | |- F/_ x F |
| 2 |  | nffn.2 | |- F/_ x A |
| 3 |  | #P_df-fn | |- ( F Fn A <-> ( Fun F /\ dom F = A ) ) |
| 4 | 1 | #P_nffun | |- F/ x Fun F |
| 5 | 1 | #P_nfdm | |- F/_ x dom F |
| 6 | 5, 2 | #P_nfeq | |- F/ x dom F = A |
| 7 | 4, 6 | #P_nfan | |- F/ x ( Fun F /\ dom F = A ) |
| 8 | 3, 7 | #P_nfxfr | |- F/ x F Fn A |
